div.label: Mongolian
div.div: ᠮᠣᠩᠭ᠋ᠣᠯ ᠤᠯᠤᠰ ᠤ᠋ᠨ ᠲᠥᠷᠢᠶᠨ ᠳᠠᠯᠪᠠᠠ / Монгол улсын төрийн далбаа

span.style: display:inline-block; font-weight:normal; font-size: 1.25em; line-height: 1.25em; -ms-writing-mode:tb-lr; writing-mode:tb-lr; -webkit-writing-mode: vertical-lr; writing-mode: vertical-lr; word-wrap:normal; vertical-align:text-top;

td.div: Tiếng Việt: Quốc kỳ Mông Cổ

ul.li: Current version is SVG implementation of the Mongolian flag as described by Mongolian National Standard MNS 6262:2011 (Mongolian State Flag. General requirements and [1].
CONSTRUCTION SHEET: Flags of the World: Mongolia, Vexilla Mundi: Mongolia and [2].

tr.td: See File history below for details.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

tr.td: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.i: This image (or other media file) is in the public domain in Mongolia and other jurisdictions.
td.p: According to the Law of Mongolia on Copyright from September 1st, 1993 as amended on February 1st, 1997, May 21st, 1999 and Jan 19, 2006, works first published in Mongolia are exempt from copyright if they fall under one of the following categories (details):

ul.li: administrative decisions and official documents of legal entities and organizations
court decisions, resolutions, judge's decrees, and other documents and speeches delivered during court hearings
translations of any of the above
coat of arms, banners, flags, awards, orders, and medals
any news for the purpose of reporting currents events and results
works of folklore and national traditions
ideas, methods, procedures, scientific discoveries, and mathematical concepts

td.p: It is asserted that this work falls into one or more of the above categories and is public domain.

a.title: File:Flag of the Mongolian People's Republic (1945–1992).svg

p.a: Flag of the Mongolian People's Republic (1945–1992).svg

span.span: The source code of this SVG is valid.
This flag was created with Inkscape.

div.div:
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time. (newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)
Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current13:53, 11 August 20191,200 × 600 (2 KB)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Lower svg file dimensions by "Inkscape" resizing from same file (latest version): better svg image display. Previous dimensions too big and not necessary. Optimized and fixed svg code before upload. No other changes.
13:08, 17 July 20194,800 × 2,400 (7 KB)Saruul 04 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 05:34, 7 May 2019 (UTC)
16:12, 29 June 20194,800 × 2,400 (1 KB)Fry1989 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 09:51, 19 June 2018 (UTC)
12:00, 29 June 20194,800 × 2,400 (1 KB)RafaelyGarabat2002 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 20:42, 18 June 2018 (UTC)
05:34, 7 May 20194,800 × 2,400 (7 KB)Saruul 04 (talk | contribs)Soyombo corrected according to construction sheet of State flag standart MNS 6262:2011
09:51, 19 June 20184,800 × 2,400 (1 KB)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)The blue and yellow match in Photoshop; the red seems to be the main sticking point.
20:42, 18 June 20184,800 × 2,400 (1 KB)FreshCorp619 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 17:43, 6 June 2018 (UTC) Colors matched per talk discussion.
20:27, 6 June 20184,800 × 2,400 (1,022 bytes)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 17:37, 6 June 2018 (UTC) yeah but the talk page is still trying to decide so going to pre revert version until consensus is decided
17:43, 6 June 20184,800 × 2,400 (1 KB)VulpesVulpes42 (talk | contribs)Should've checked talk page. I'll think that the people over there have a better idea of what's going on than I have.
17:37, 6 June 20184,800 × 2,400 (1,022 bytes)VulpesVulpes42 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version before the edit war, also the most credible arguments.
(newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)

The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
